We introduce ourselves as one of the manufacturing and general suppliers Of Stud, Nut, Washer, Pin, Shaft. We were established in 2016, in Veppampattu, Thiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India. Since Origin, we have been engaged in Turning, Drilling, Production, and Toolroom work.

Our products are widely used as important spare parts of different machines in numerous industries. Our products are built using superior grade metals and alloys that are supplied by some prominent vendors of the market.

MACHINERIES

WE OWN POWERFULL MACHINES TO MAKE QULAITY PRODUCTS.

MAKING PROCESS

PRODUCTS WE MAKE

STEP PIN

OUTER DIAMETER: 20MM
COLLER DIAMETER: 30MM
TOTAL LENGTH: 75MM

OUTER DIAMETER: 30MM
TOTAL LENGTH: 50MM

WORM SHAFT

OUTER DIAMETER: 20MM

TOTAL LENGTH: 100MM

More

We have good infrastructure equipped with all the necessary facilities. For delivering our range safely to our clients, we have sustained a superb inventory and also ensure delivering our products within a stipulated time span.

To accomplish our belief we have been putting efforts in delivering good quality products. We can ensure you that business with Sri Raghavendra Industries will always keep you gratified.

In order to maintain flawless production, we have a team of qualified and well-versed professionals. Our company has also employed knowledgeable quality who conduct extensive Spectro tests on varied parameters.
